pure interface of interface zeta.session.Unit

The documentated page. 
public interface Unit
{
    public abstract Name getName();
    public abstract String getFileName();
    public abstract Serializable query(ContentType type)
      throws zeta.session.Failures.ComputationFailed, zeta.session.Failures.CannotCompute;
    public abstract boolean isUptodate(ContentType type);
    public abstract void outdate(ContentType type);
    public abstract void define(ContentType type,
                                Serializable content,
                                boolean persistent,
                                Date createdAt,
                                Target[] dependencies,
                                Adaptor adaptor);
    public abstract void link(ContentType otherType,
                              ContentType type);
}
